faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and how we can help your brand grow.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Get in touch with our team and we'll be happy to help you.

q1.question: How does Tikit Agency work?
q1.answer: Our process is simple and effective: First, we dive deep into understanding your brand goals and target audience. Then, our strategy team develops a customized campaign plan. Next, we match you with the right creators or create compelling content. Finally, we execute the campaign and provide real-time analytics and reporting. Throughout the process, you'll have a dedicated account manager ensuring everything runs smoothly.

q2.question: What is your production process?
q2.answer: Our production workflow has four phases: 1) Pre-Production - concept development, scriptwriting, location scouting, and planning. 2) Production - professional filming with cinema cameras, drones, and state-of-the-art equipment. 3) Post-Production - expert editing, color grading, motion graphics, and sound design. 4) Delivery - optimized content in all required formats for your platforms. We handle everything from social media reels to full-scale commercial productions.

q3.question: Who is on the Tikit team?
q3.answer: Our team consists of 50+ creative professionals including: strategists who plan data-driven campaigns, content creators and videographers who bring ideas to life, social media managers who engage audiences, designers who craft visual identities, and account managers who ensure client satisfaction. We also have specialists in influencer relations, analytics, and paid advertising across the MENA region.

q4.question: Where are Tikit's offices located?
q4.answer: Tikit Agency has a strategic presence across the MENA region. Our headquarters is in Dubai at The Burlington Tower, Marasi Drive, Office 309. We also have dedicated offices in Saudi Arabia (serving Riyadh and Jeddah), Istanbul (Turkey), and Syria. This regional presence allows us to understand local markets and deliver culturally relevant campaigns across the GCC and broader MENA region.

q5.question: How long does a typical campaign take?
q5.answer: Campaign timelines vary based on scope and objectives. A quick influencer activation can launch in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive brand campaigns typically take 4-8 weeks from strategy to execution. Full-scale production projects may require 6-12 weeks. During our initial consultation, we'll provide a detailed timeline tailored to your specific project and goals.

q6.question: What platforms do you specialize in?
q6.answer: We manage campaigns across all major social media platforms including Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, and Facebook. We're particularly strong in platforms popular in the MENA region like Instagram and Snapchat. Our team stays updated with platform algorithms, trending formats, and best practices to maximize your content's reach and engagement.

q7.question: Do you work with international brands?
q7.answer: Absolutely! While we're based in the MENA region, we work with both local and international brands. Our multilingual team (English, Arabic, French, Turkish) and cultural expertise help global brands enter and succeed in Middle Eastern markets. We've successfully launched campaigns for brands from Europe, Asia, and North America looking to establish presence in the GCC region.

q8.question: What is your pricing structure?
q8.answer: Our pricing is customized based on project scope, deliverables, and campaign duration. We offer flexible packages ranging from one-time projects to ongoing retainer agreements. Influencer marketing campaigns start based on the creator tier and engagement goals. Production services are quoted per project based on complexity. Contact us for a detailed proposal tailored to your budget and objectives.

q9.question: How do you measure campaign success?
q9.answer: We track comprehensive metrics aligned with your goals: reach and impressions, engagement rates (likes, comments, shares), website traffic and conversions, follower growth, brand sentiment analysis, and ROI. You'll receive detailed analytics reports showing campaign performance, audience insights, and recommendations for optimization. We believe in transparency and data-driven results.

q10.question: Can you help with both organic and paid campaigns?
q10.answer: Yes! We offer both organic content strategy and paid advertising services. Our organic approach focuses on authentic engagement, community building, and content that resonates. For paid campaigns, we manage social media ads across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, and LinkedIn with precise targeting and budget optimization. Most clients benefit from a hybrid approach combining both strategies for maximum impact.

header.title: Project Deep Dive
header.description: Browse categories on the left and explore each section within the selected area on the right.

sidebar.title: Sections
sidebar.description: Navigate through each phase of our campaign methodology.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Define clear goals and measurable outcomes that drive the entire campaign strategy forward.

brief.title: Brief
brief.description: Comprehensive overview of the project scope, requirements, and creative direction.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Detailed execution plan mapping out channels, timeline, and resource allocation.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: Creative methodology and tactical implementation showcasing our unique process.

objective.title: Campaign Objective
objective.body:
Our primary objective was to establish a powerful brand presence across multiple digital touchpoints while driving measurable engagement and conversion metrics. We focused on creating authentic connections with the target audience through strategic influencer partnerships and compelling content narratives.

The campaign aimed to achieve a 40% increase in brand awareness within the target demographic, generate over 2 million organic impressions, and establish long-term relationships with key industry influencers. By leveraging data-driven insights and creative storytelling, we positioned the brand as an industry leader in innovation and customer-centric values.

Secondary objectives included building a sustainable content ecosystem, fostering community engagement, and creating shareable moments that would extend the campaign's reach organically beyond paid media investments.

brief.title: Project Brief
brief.body:
The client approached us with a clear vision: transform their digital presence and connect with a younger, more engaged audience segment. The brief outlined specific requirements for influencer selection, content themes, and brand messaging consistency across all touchpoints.

Key deliverables included a comprehensive influencer partnership program spanning 12 weeks, creation of 50+ pieces of original content across Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, and development of a brand ambassador program for sustained engagement.

The brief emphasized authenticity as the cornerstone of all content creation, ensuring that influencer partnerships felt genuine and aligned with both the brand's values and the creator's personal style. Budget allocation prioritized quality over quantity, with focus on micro-influencers who demonstrated high engagement rates within niche communities.

strategy.title: Strategic Framework
strategy.body:
Our strategy centered on a three-phase approach: Discovery, Activation, and Amplification. Each phase built upon the previous, creating a cohesive narrative arc that kept audiences engaged throughout the campaign duration.

Phase One focused on identifying and vetting potential influencer partners, conducting audience analysis, and establishing content guidelines. We utilized proprietary tools to assess creator authenticity scores and audience overlap potential.

Phase Two involved coordinated content rollout across platforms, with carefully timed posts designed to maximize algorithmic visibility. Real-time monitoring allowed for agile adjustments to content strategy based on performance metrics.

Phase Three amplified top-performing content through paid media support and cross-platform repurposing, extending reach while maintaining cost efficiency. Community management protocols ensured consistent brand voice in all audience interactions.

approach.title: Creative Approach
approach.body:
Our creative approach prioritized authentic storytelling over traditional advertising formats. Each piece of content was developed collaboratively with influencer partners, ensuring their unique voice remained central while effectively communicating brand messages.

The visual identity maintained consistency through subtle brand integration techniques that felt native to each platform's aesthetic expectations. We developed platform-specific content variations that respected the unique culture and consumption patterns of each channel's user base.

influencerMarketing.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About Influencer Marketing

faqItems.question: What is influencer marketing and how does it work?
faqItems.answer: Influencer marketing is a form of social media marketing that uses endorsements and product mentions from individuals who have a dedicated social following. Brands partner with influencers to reach their target audience through authentic, trusted voices. The process typically involves identifying relevant influencers, negotiating partnerships, creating content, and measuring campaign performance.

faqItems.question: How much does influencer marketing cost in the UAE?
faqItems.answer: Influencer marketing costs in the UAE vary based on factors such as influencer tier (nano, micro, macro, or celebrity), platform, content type, and campaign duration. Nano-influencers (1K-10K followers) may charge AED 500-2,000 per post, while celebrity influencers can command AED 50,000+ per campaign. Tikit Agency provides customized quotes based on your specific goals and budget.

faqItems.question: Which social media platforms are best for influencer marketing?
faqItems.answer: The best platforms depend on your target audience and goals. Instagram remains the most popular for lifestyle, fashion, and beauty brands. TikTok excels for reaching younger demographics with viral content. YouTube is ideal for in-depth product reviews and tutorials. Snapchat is particularly effective in the UAE and GCC markets. LinkedIn works well for B2B influencer campaigns.

faqItems.question: How do you measure influencer marketing ROI?
faqItems.answer: We measure influencer marketing ROI through multiple metrics: reach and impressions, engagement rate (likes, comments, shares), click-through rates, conversion tracking, brand mention monitoring, and audience growth. Our team provides detailed analytics reports showing campaign performance, cost per engagement, and recommendations for optimization.

faqItems.question: How long does an influencer marketing campaign take?
faqItems.answer: Campaign timelines vary based on scope and objectives. A quick influencer activation can launch in 1-2 weeks. Standard campaigns typically take 4-6 weeks from strategy to execution. Comprehensive brand ambassador programs may span 3-12 months. During consultation, we provide a detailed timeline tailored to your project requirements.

faqItems.question: Does Tikit Agency work with local UAE influencers?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Tikit Agency has an extensive network of influencers across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and the broader GCC region. We work with Arabic and English-speaking creators across all niches including fashion, beauty, lifestyle, tech, food, travel, fitness, and more. Our local presence in Dubai allows us to build strong, authentic relationships with regional influencers.

socialMediaManagement.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About Social Media Management

faqItems.question: What does social media management include?
faqItems.answer: Social media management includes content strategy and planning, post creation (graphics, videos, copy), content scheduling and publishing, community management (comments, messages, mentions), analytics and performance reporting, paid social advertising, and crisis management. We tailor the scope to your goals and budget.

faqItems.question: How much does social media management cost in the UAE?
faqItems.answer: Costs vary based on number of platforms, posting frequency, and scope (organic only vs. organic + paid). Monthly retainers typically range from AED 5,000 to AED 25,000+ for full-service management. Tikit Agency provides customized proposals based on your specific needs.

faqItems.question: Which platforms do you manage?
faqItems.answer: We manage campaigns across Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, Facebook, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn. We recommend platforms based on your target audience and business objectives. Many UAE and GCC brands focus on Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat for maximum regional reach.

faqItems.question: How do you measure social media success?
faqItems.answer: We track reach, impressions, engagement rate, follower growth, click-through rate, conversions, and ROI. You receive regular reports with clear metrics and actionable recommendations. Goals are set during onboarding and reviewed in monthly strategy calls.

faqItems.question: How long until we see results?
faqItems.answer: Community growth and engagement often show improvement within 2-3 months. Significant brand awareness and conversion impact typically build over 6-12 months with consistent strategy and content. We set realistic benchmarks during the initial consultation.

faqItems.question: Do you work with Arabic and English content?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Our team creates content in Arabic, English, and bilingual formats. We understand cultural nuances across the UAE and GCC and tailor messaging and creative to resonate with your target audience.

definition.paragraph: Video production is the process of creating video content from initial concept through final delivery. It encompasses pre-production planning, on-set filming with professional cameras and equipment, and post-production editing including color grading, sound design, and visual effects to produce polished content for commercials, social media, corporate communications, and brand storytelling.
definition.benefitsTitle: Key Benefits of Professional Video Production
benefitsList: Higher engagement rates compared to static images and text content
Professional quality that builds brand credibility and trust
Versatile content that can be repurposed across multiple platforms
Effective storytelling that conveys complex messages clearly
Improved SEO and social media algorithm performance with video
processSteps: Pre-production: concept development, scriptwriting, storyboarding, and planning
Production: filming with professional crew, cameras, lighting, and audio equipment
Post-production: editing, color grading, motion graphics, and sound design
Review and revision cycles with client feedback integration
Final delivery in optimized formats for all required platforms

production.faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions About Video Production

faqItems.question: What is included in video production?
faqItems.answer: Video production includes pre-production (concept, script, storyboard, planning), production (filming with professional crew and equipment), and post-production (editing, color grading, sound design, VFX). Deliverables are provided in formats optimized for your chosen platforms.

faqItems.question: How much does video production cost in the UAE?
faqItems.answer: Costs vary by project scope, length, and complexity. Social content and short-form videos may start from AED 10,000-30,000. Commercials and full-scale productions typically range from AED 50,000 to AED 200,000+. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your brief and deliverables.

faqItems.question: How long does a video project take?
faqItems.answer: Simple social content can be delivered in 1-2 weeks. Standard commercials and brand films typically take 4-8 weeks from concept to delivery. Larger productions with multiple locations or complex post-production may require 8-16 weeks. We provide a timeline in the project proposal.

faqItems.question: Do you provide photography as well?
faqItems.answer: Yes. We offer professional photography including product photography, event coverage, portraits, and lifestyle content. Many clients bundle video and photography for campaigns and content libraries.

faqItems.question: What equipment do you use?
faqItems.answer: We use cinema cameras (4K and 8K), drones, professional lighting, gimbals, and industry-standard editing and color grading tools. Equipment is selected per project to match creative and delivery requirements.

faqItems.question: Can you shoot in multiple locations?
faqItems.answer: Yes. We have experience shooting across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and the GCC. We handle permits and logistics and work with local crews when needed for larger regional productions.

cta.title: Ready To Build Your Brand?
cta.description: Let's create a brand identity that makes a lasting impression

definition.paragraph: Branding is the strategic process of creating a unique identity for a business or product. It encompasses visual elements such as logo design, color palette, typography, and imagery, combined with brand messaging, voice, and values to create a cohesive identity that resonates with target audiences and differentiates the business from competitors in the marketplace.
benefitsList: Increased brand recognition and recall among target audiences
Clear differentiation from competitors in crowded markets
Builds trust and credibility with customers and stakeholders
Consistent visual and verbal identity across all touchpoints
Supports premium pricing and customer loyalty over time
processSteps: Discovery and research phase to understand business, competitors, and target audience
Strategy development defining brand positioning, personality, and messaging
Visual exploration creating multiple design directions and concepts
Refinement and finalization of chosen direction with detailed execution
Brand system creation and comprehensive guidelines documentation

trust.title: Why Trust Tikit Agency

trust.card1Desc: Our design team brings extensive experience in brand identity creation.
trust.card2Desc: Deep knowledge of UAE and GCC market aesthetics and cultural nuances.
trust.card3Desc: Served startups, SMEs, and enterprises across multiple industries.
trust.card4Desc: Recognized for creative excellence and innovative design solutions.
trust.paragraph: Tikit Agency has created brand identities for clients across industries including hospitality, real estate, technology, F&B, fashion, healthcare, and financial services. Our design team combines strategic thinking with creative execution to deliver brands that stand out and drive business results.

faqItems.question: What is branding and why is it important?
faqItems.answer: Branding is the process of creating a distinctive identity for a business that includes visual elements (logo, colors, typography), messaging, and the overall perception customers have of your company. Strong branding builds recognition, trust, and loyalty, differentiating your business from competitors and creating lasting connections with your target audience.

faqItems.question: What does a branding agency do?
faqItems.answer: A branding agency helps businesses develop and maintain their brand identity. Services include brand strategy development, logo design, visual identity creation, brand guidelines documentation, packaging design, and brand refresh projects. We work to ensure your brand communicates the right message and resonates with your target audience across all touchpoints.

faqItems.question: How much does branding cost in the UAE?
faqItems.answer: Branding costs vary based on scope and complexity. Basic logo design packages start from AED 5,000-15,000. Complete brand identity packages including logo, visual identity, and guidelines typically range from AED 20,000-75,000. Comprehensive branding projects with strategy, naming, and full collateral can range from AED 100,000+. Tikit Agency provides customized quotes based on your specific requirements.

faqItems.question: How long does a branding project take?
faqItems.answer: Timelines depend on project scope. A logo design project typically takes 2-4 weeks. A complete brand identity package usually requires 6-10 weeks. Full branding projects including strategy, visual identity, and collateral design can take 12-16 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during initial consultation based on your specific deliverables.

faqItems.question: What is included in a brand identity package?
faqItems.answer: A comprehensive brand identity package typically includes: logo design (primary, secondary, and icon versions), color palette with specifications, typography system, brand guidelines document, business card and letterhead design, social media templates, and brand application examples. Additional elements like packaging, signage, and website design can be added based on needs.

faqItems.question: When should a business consider rebranding?
faqItems.answer: Consider rebranding when your current brand no longer reflects your business values or direction, when entering new markets or expanding services, when your brand looks outdated compared to competitors, after a merger or acquisition, or when your target audience has shifted. A brand refresh can modernize your image while maintaining brand equity.
